hero.title: Showcase Your Services on Helhal
hero.subtitle: Receive orders and work your way—part-time or full-time.

howItWorks.title: How to Join as a Freelancer?

step1.title: Create Your Service Quickly
step1.subtitle: Write a clear description, set the price and duration, and add samples of your work.

step2.title: Receive Orders
step2.subtitle: Communicate with the client inside the platform, agree on the details, and start working.

step3.title: Deliver & Get Paid
step3.subtitle: Once delivery is approved, your earnings are transferred securely according to platform policies.

whyFreelancer.title: Why Work with Helhal?
points: Access to serious clients looking for media services.
Showcase your work and reviews to increase your chances of getting orders.
An organized experience for communication and delivery.
Technical support whenever you need it.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you get started.
faqs.hint: If you have another question, contact us and we’ll help you right away.
faqs.noFaqs: There are no FAQs available at the moment.

whatCanISell.question: What can I sell?
whatCanISell.answer: Be creative! You can offer any service you wish as long as it's legal and complies with our terms. There are over 200 categories you can browse to get ideas.

howMuchMoney.question: How much money can I make?
howMuchMoney.answer: Your earnings depend on the demand, quality, and uniqueness of your service.

howMuchTime.question: How much time will I need to invest?
howMuchTime.answer: You decide your own schedule — from part-time to full-time commitment.

howDoIGetPaid.question: How do I get paid?
howDoIGetPaid.answer: Payments are securely processed and transferred directly to your chosen method.

howMuchDoesItCost.question: How much does it cost?
howMuchDoesItCost.answer: Creating an account is free. We only take a service fee per completed order.

howDoIPrice.question: How do I price my service?
howDoIPrice.answer: You set your own price depending on complexity, time, and expertise.

Expands the Helhal community and increases options for clients and freelancers.
